data.title: Paul Seibert on LinkedIn: #bigcommerce #ecommerce #oracle #oraclenetsuite #digitalinnovation #erp…
data.meta_description:
Explore the Evolution of BigCommerce! 🛍️
🚀 Uncover the History of BigCommerce! 🚀 👇👇




Curious about how BigCommerce became a leader in eCommerce? Our… | 23 comments on LinkedIn
data.text:
🚀 Exciting changes are happening in the world of eCommerce! 👉Composable commerce is the future; BigCommerce is leading the way. 👇 👇 In our latest LinkedIn carousel, we dive into why **BigCommerce's Composable Commerce** is paving the way for the future of online retail. From increased flexibility to a tailored shopping experience, this innovative approach is redefining how brands can connect with their customers. Join us as we explore the key benefits and emerging trends that make Composable Commerce a game-changer for businesses of all sizes! 💡✨ Swipe through to discover how you can harness the power of composability to stay ahead in the digital marketplace! 👉📈 With SCG Team's BigCommerce Composable Commerce veteran expertise, US-based support, and on-site capabilities, we ensure you’re equipped for success. SCG Team, the Seibert Consulting Group, is an award-winning NetSuite ERP, BigCommerce and Klaviyo agency headquartered in Palm Springs, California, with offices in Carlsbad and Boston. We provide on-site support at locations with our American, US-based team. Unlike offshore operations , we offer local expertise and personalized service. Don't risk your business operations and revenues on unstable BigCommerce Agencies from South America or the Philippines. Work with a BigCommerce Agency you can count on in uncertain times. #BigCommerce #ComposableCommerce #eCommerce #Innovation #magento #adobecommerce #suitecommerce #suitecommerceadvanced #netsuite #oracle #oraclenetsuite #suiteworld #suiteworld24 #suiteworld2024

The Oracle x Shopify partnerships is a weird “we're better together”. My read: Oracle’s admitting Shopify’s gaining ground. The TLDR of this announcement: if you are NetSuite/Oracle CDP customer, you can integrate that data with Shopify. But why though? The whole point of the suite Oracle Commerce + CDP + NetSuite = magic. The “better together” narrative doesn’t make sense. If you can also integrate the pieces with Shopify. So why are they announcing this partnership? Shopify wins 1-2 key accounts + helps bigger brands who use NetSuite’s ERP/CDP. Netsuite can't lose anymore ERP customers trying to make Oracle Suite a thing. Long term (10 years) though: Shopify eats this entire market. Klaviyo or Yotpo become the go-to CDP. The big question is: does anybody take out NetSuite? ERP is the last major key component in this race for Ent Shopify. And it's pretty clear Shopify’s not going to build it themselves. No app has come in and taken the dominant share there. Does NetSuite keep the crown or does someone disrupt them? #shopify

Great articulation of the opportunity in front of GoodDay Software by Jeremy Horowitz'. To disrupt Netsuite ERP in the Shopify ecosystem, we will build as closely and natively into Shopify as possible. This is to bring simplicity & ease of use to merchants who need these complex operating tools badly. Coming out of Shopify Editions (Summer 2024) yesterday, it is very clear to me that GoodDay Software and many others in the Shopify ecosystem are bringing innovation to the space. Here we go.

Dynamic Pricing with BigCommerce & NetSuite : Imagine offering exclusive discounts to your loyal customers, rewarding high-value groups with special pricing, and attracting new buyers with competitive deals. All this, while maintaining healthy profit margins? Sounds like a dream, right? Well, with the powerful duo of BigCommerce and NetSuite, it's not just a dream, it's a reality! By leveraging their seamless integration, you can implement dynamic pricing strategies that cater to different customer groups, boosting your sales and customer satisfaction like never before. Implementing different price level allocation for customer groups in BigCommerce through NetSuite requires expertise. But worry not! ZOHANCE is your one-stop shop for smooth solutions. Contact ZOHANCE today and start your journey towards dynamic pricing success! contact@zohance.com #netsuite #bigcommerce #netsuiteconsultant #netsuiteerp #netsuiteimplementation

🔥 Igniting revenue after the peak holiday season starts with understanding your data and key shopping trends. In this clip from our #commerce webinar series, David Rastatter unpacks a few crucial points to keep in mind, including: 🔄 20% of purchases will be returned; how can you automate and streamline the returns process to enhance the #customerexperience? 🛒 88% of consumers say it takes 3+ purchases to build #brandloyalty; what programs and initiatives can you implement to turn first-time holiday buyers into returning customers? Commerce experts from NetSuite, BigCommerce, and ShipStation answer these q's (and more) in our on-demand webinar. Sign up to watch it now 👉 https://ow.ly/q5u250QrS5s

At Oracle, we're dedicated to empowering businesses with cutting-edge solutions, and our latest venture into E-Commerce is no exception. With Oracle E-Commerce, businesses can now unlock unparalleled opportunities to thrive in the digital marketplace. Key Features: 🔹 Seamless Integration: Integrate your online store with Oracle's robust suite of business applications for enhanced efficiency and performance. 🔹 Personalized Customer Experience: Tailor every interaction with your customers through advanced personalization capabilities, driving engagement and loyalty. 🔹 Scalability and Flexibility: Grow your business with confidence, knowing that Oracle E-Commerce can scale alongside your evolving needs. 🔹 Analytics and Insights: Gain valuable insights into customer behavior and trends to inform strategic decision-making and drive business success. Whether you're a small startup or a global enterprise, Oracle E-Commerce empowers you to elevate your online presence, expand your reach, and drive revenue growth. Ready to embark on your E-Commerce journey with Oracle? Contact us today to learn more and take your business to new heights! 🚀💼 #Oracle #ECommerce #DigitalTransformation #Innovation #BusinessSolutions
